name: adddi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c2))))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c2))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c2))))

comment: Alias for ~ ax-distr , for naming consistency with ~ adddii . (Contributed by NM, 10-Mar-2008.)
